name: Jungle Mania - Multiplayer
description:
You love the match three games out there ? Well stop playing like a robot level to level like crazy.
We offer you online multiplayer battles against other players, friends or social network buddies around the world and show your skills.
Let us tell you more about the game. Its a classic puzzle game with many functionalities.
Matching the animals will give you points, with these points after every round you will attack your opponent, the battle is five rounds, based on points you will have a shield and attack bonus. On every round you will have a wild card, its a animal that you have to match for bonus attack or defense points on each of the five rounds. With every multiplayer game you will gain points to get a bigger level and upgrade characters. To help you on your journey you will have six power-ups to smash the opponents.
